entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
